title: Workshop for Enhancing Mathematics Teachers' Competencies Using Generative Artificial Intelligence (GAI)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and experience in teaching mathematics
context.additional_context: Course developing GAI utilization competencies through experiential learning and collaborative tasks in smartphone-centric constrained technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of GAI (Generative Artificial Intelligence) and its educational applicability.
Learners can create at least one mathematics lesson resource using GAI tools via smartphones.
Learners can collaboratively develop and share GAI-based open educational resources (math problem-solving scenarios) through group tasks.
Learners can propose lesson designs applying the three interaction types (cognitive, socio-emotional, instructor-guided) of the SAIL framework.

resources: Smartphone-Supported Generative AI (GAI) Apps (e.g., Canva AI, Grammarly)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
